General.Name: Fiberweb (India) Limited
General.Description: Fiberweb (India) Limited manufactures and sells spunbond and melt-blown polypropylene nonwoven fabrics in India. The company serves hygiene, agriculture crop cover, and medical and industrial clothing industries. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, and Gulf countries. The company was formerly known as PVD Plast Mould Industries Limited. Fiberweb (India) Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Mumbai, India.

4.Name: Mr. Bhavesh Pravin Sheth B.Com., F.C.A.
4.Title: Pres and Non-Exec. & Non-Independent Director
